code: export function startAuroraAnimation(){var filter=document.querySelector("#turbulence");var frames=0;var rad=Math.PI/480;function freqAnimation(){var bfx=0.005;var bfy=0.005;frames+=.5;bfx+=0.0025*Math.cos(frames*rad);bfy+=0.0025*Math.sin(frames*rad);var bf=bfx.toString()+' '+bfy.toString();filter.setAttributeNS(null,'baseFrequency',bf);window.requestAnimationFrame(freqAnimation);}window.requestAnimationFrame(freqAnimation);}
